reviewText: I bought this for my husband who is a former motocross rider and he was thrilled with it! TWO thumbs way UP!!!!!!!
Have watched this Vid 50 times and still love it. Come home all the time from work and my son is glued to the tv watching it again.

Done in a documentary style, TGO Ten tells the gripping story of 2011's motocross season. The music parallels and enhances the racers' journeys instead of overshadowing them. Intriguing throughout the whole thing, TGO Ten is probably my favorite season to date.
